overview: Keep on truckin' with Triga! On British roads you see these fit rough lads speeding around in their work vans - sandwich in one hand, steering wheel in the other. Well we found out why these fit fuckers are so keen to cut you up and then give you the finger! The British White Van drivers are mainly horny builders, cocky carpenters, or our favourite: fit married plumbers! We've always wanted to know, do they actually just spend most of their day in the bookies or are they the hard working tradesmen that they want you to think they are? We've always thought of them as spunk filled baby makers! Triga Films' White Van Man exposes what they really get up to, and as you expect from Triga, they are just damn right filthy horny fuckers!
title: White Van Man
